credit_line: Gift of friends of J. Hodge Markgraf '52, Ebenezer Fitch Professor of Chemistry (1930-2007)
title: 715 molecules
description:
Located in Science Quad between Clark Hall and Thompson Biology and east of Bronfman Science Center

This sculpture is a table with four benches that is made out of  blocks of diorite. On all the visual surfaces chemical formuli are sandblasted in shallow depressions.
